Pre-Game Insights: India has an undefeated streak against Pakistan in the ICC World cup.
Both teams have the lethal bowling attack in T20 cricket.
Others: The two teams last met in the group stages of the 2019 ICC Cricket World Cup, with India convincingly defeating Pakistan.
In the recently concluded IPL, nine out of 12 matches have been won by the chasing teams.
The pitch in Dubai has been excellent for batting, but in the last few IPL matches, the track is slowing down slightly as the game progresses.
